revision.comment: Clean up [[:Category:Pages using duplicate arguments in template calls|duplicate template arguments]]
revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory|action1=GAN |action1date=15:08, 27 September 2010 UTC |action1link=Talk:SMS Kronprinz (1914)/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=387328977 |action2=WAR |action2date=12:29, 25 October 2010 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/SMS Kronprinz (1914) |action2result=approved |action2oldid=390986497 |action3=FAC |action3date=04:35, 20 December 2010 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/SMS Kronprinz (1914)/archive1 |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=403272083 |action4=FTC |action4date=16:33, 10 January 2011 (UTC) |action4link=Wikipedia:Featured topic candidates/König class battleships/archive1 |action4result=promoted |action5=GTC |action5date=02:55, 25 August 2011 |action5link=Wikipedia:Featured topic candidates/Battleships of Germany/archive1 |action5result=promoted |ftname=Battleships of Germany |dykdate=5 October 2010 |dykentry=... that the German '''{{SMS|Kronprinz |1914 |6}}''' was the only {{sclass|König |battleship |6}} to escape damage at the [[Battle of Jutland]] on {{Nowrap|31 May}} – {{Nowrap|1 June}} 1916? | topic = history |currentstatus=FA |four=no }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Shipwrecks|importance=mid|class=FA}} {{WikiProject Scottish Islands|class=FA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Germany|class=FA|importance= low }} {{WikiProject Ships|class=FA}} {{WPMILHIST|class=FA|A-Class=pass|Maritime=yes|German=yes|WWI=yes|OMT=1}} }} == 45 million Goldmarks == Was 45 million Goldmarks expensive compared to the average construction cost of other German battleships at the time? [[User:P. S. Burton|P. S. Burton]] ([[User talk:P. S. Burton|talk]]) 21:47, 22 November 2010 (UTC) :Each subsequent class of battleships were increasingly more expensive, so in vague terms, more expensive than the ''Kaiser''s but cheaper than the ''Bayern''s. IIRC, the [[Nassau class battleship]], [[Helgoland class battleship]], etc. articles should have their respective costs included. If not, I can add them later - I'm at work at the moment. [[User:Parsecboy|Parsecboy]] ([[User talk:Parsecboy|talk]]) 00:03, 23 November 2010 (UTC)
